Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '39'. Wrongly inked registration number '143'. Name Estiaios. Perhaps from same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, BIBALEX 0196, which has an erroneous short version of the name (Estiou), which might have appeared here.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (142)
